author: Andreas Schulze Bäing
comment: It offers most functions of the website, plus the function to search nearby profiles. One odd feature is that some fields from the old website are still visible on the app, but not anymore on the new website. Unlike the UK version of the new website, the app also allows searching by metric height, good for people like me not familiar with feet/inches.

author: Red Blondie
comment: Disappointing. I agree with most of the other reviewers. Messages from people who have clearly not bothered to read your profile. Sick to the back teeth of reading profiles of guys (sorry men!) who like glasses of wine, DVDs and blazing log fires! Photos of people covering their eyes with sunglasses or pints of lager in hand! Is this what life has become for the over 40s?

author: Sean Cassidy
comment: App gets me by OK. Doesn't say whether someone has read my message like on  the desktop side to a point where I have to log in on my mobile browser and set to desktop mode.  Push notifications are unreliable, they work probably 65% of the time. Browsing profiles is good though.

author: Luke Marlow
comment: Awful can't choose or centre profile pics easily, message notifications are wrong and messages in mixed order, customer support terrible, no refunds, can't see if messages have been read, keeps promoting how many views I've had as if it matters? Probably more likely to get a date writing this review then on there! ✌️

author: bob batter
comment: One of the most broken apps I've ever used. Sends push messages to say someone has viewed, then when you go to see who that person doesn't exist. Sends emails with the same problem. Now I just get the generic email saying people have viewed... not who specifically has and when you log in there's no new views. Personally had good success from the format but this app specifically is an absolute joke. If I was one of the devs who created this I'd be feeling very embarrassed!

author: Stephen Davis-Barker
comment: Have to pay for messages...avoid..doesn't tell you this until after profile is created! Waste my time

author: Eva C
comment: I like the look and feel but there's so much wrong with this app, I don't know where to start. As already mentioned by previous reviewers, notifications work and then they don't. Very unreliable. Then messages you have read still show as unread. But my biggest bugbear of all, has to be that once I created my profile on desktop, when I went to edit it on my phone things like my bio just disappeared completely. Changes made on the app don't seem to be replicated on desktop. Also, searching through profiles is a pain without being able to look at someone's profile in detail without adding them to your favourites first. But then you can't remove them from your favourites either so they think they are your favourites while in fact after reading their profiles you're not interested

author: Ian Ebo
comment: Disappointing is defiantly a word I would use. This site is very expensive to be ignored and have fake profiles.. I didn't pay £60 to have fake spammers and money grabbers from Germany or Russia wanting "serious relationship' and they just want money..  People ignore you and don't bother to message back even after liking it or adding you as a favourite .. anyone who is thinking of joining the site please stay clear...your not going to find your true love on there unless willing to pay £££££ to wait ages for nothing...avoid avoid avoid !!!!

author: steve girdwood
comment: Paying for basic functions like messaging is just a disgusting money grab

author: Chris Barrow
comment: Maybe it works. Maybe it does not. Its too expensive to find out.

author: patricia santos
comment: I can't even put my poste code it says it doesn't exist or it is wrong......

author: MainlyHuman
comment: Payment tiers are very confusing. Just how much do I need to pay in order to read people's replies??

author: Mark Sutton
comment: Offers a monthly plan, then deducts the total 6 month cost at the checkout, not a monthly plan whatsoever. Very misleading.
A bit expensive but quite a population on here so something must be working.

author: Brian Sherlock
comment: Feedback email is broken (Unforgivable) and the app has less functionality than the desktop site but technically it works fine.

author: James Parry
comment: Very area dependant, ideal for cities etc

author: Si To
comment: The message inbox needs to be fixed. Even though when the messages have been read, it still shows as unread. 😕

author: Daniel Micklam
comment: Very expensive for very little
Ripped me off for money
it did work fine but recently it just keeps crashing

author: Nikolajs Lohins
comment: The option to search people by username would be useful, like in the web version.

author: Joe Dunne
comment: I can't singe in

author: Mark Palmer
comment: Great site ... fun and easy to use. Highly recommended.

author: Dave Steel
comment: Messenger terrible.....

author: Ross Espley
comment: Very useful app love it

author: Mark Pantaleon
comment: Good stuff

author: AJ H
comment: Fun

author: Tom Kennedy
comment: I paid for 6 month subscription.....wish I hadn't. I got a bump the first week, a few views, winks, chats, etc. 2nd week, it dried up, very few views. Doesn't seem like there's many women on the site. They fill it with women from different countries to make it seem like there's more than there is. There is not many women that matched my search criteria, I think the site holds back on matches to make u pay for add ons to get u more matches. Disgraceful as I paid nearly 80 euros for my subscription.........buyer beware, avoid!

author: Lloyd S
comment: It's the most user friendly app between this, Tinder and POF but I'm a dubious about the visits listed for my page.  In the last 3 days it seems people suddenly stopped looking at my page. I bought a boost which I swear is rigged to list random people 'visiting' my page, then changed my tagline to ask why suddenly nobody was visiting and within minutes somebody just so happened to visit my page. Now its gone back to nobody. Probably won't be re-subscribing in June.
worst app ever... pay to send messages to other users? sorry but pof does it for free. conmen
Waste of time and money! Repeats the same people over and over again!

author: Gawain Barton
comment: Rubbish site, will take money out of your account even if you cancel. Do not use this site.

author: Jeff Rogers
comment: I think this could be a gtear site however if you want to use it fully be prepared to pay to usr

author: Craig Fews
comment: Broken broken broken. Still, after many years of coming on and off this site/app. Emailed support from app for it to bounce back due their servers not being set up correctly. Probably set up by the same developers who wrote the app. Disgusting fraudulent company. 3* app. And company not doing anything about it. Incompetent.

Suddenly getting 742 or more views on refreshing app, when previously 5 or so that hour. Tells me something not right. Tbh i have cancelled my autosubcription which is super hard to find. Buyer be ware. Get out and connect in real life... thats my plan now.

author: Harbinder Dhillon
comment: So bad.!! For a leading dating website the interface on the app is poor.  Unless you add on upgrades I really don't think you are actually getting a service any better than the free sites that are out there.  I think match is about maximum profits and less about quality of experience and matches.

author: Kim Waite
comment: I don't see how an integral function of the app - the chat - can actually be so bad and not be rectified. The delay on messages is unreal and it informs me seemingly randomly that I have messages when I don't. Pathetic. Would advise them to get it sorted otherwise I'll be arguing the toss for a refund.

author: Paul Phoenix
comment: Absolutely the worst app ever. Does not let you change profile pic and if u delete it they do.not accept future submissions as prof pics. I am now stuck with a wasted 6 month membership and no picture. Moving on

author: ianpurves
comment: The older version was much better . Cannot delete things as they suggest as app or Web site do not have the means to do it. The whole site seems to be Un user friendly. If I had realised how it had changed I would not have paid up front & used different site

author: Lottie's Channel
comment: Totally  conned into paying for it. Asked to confirm I said no and it took money from me. Wasn't clear you paid a lump sum and not monthly.  Not clear either that 10 conversations is not 10 with other people just 10 separate statements. Dire site. Rip off now. Desperate because people get so much more from the free ones. Don't bother.
